text:
@montcocourtnews on Twitter

Carl Hessler Jr. is a multi-media reporter who writes about crime and justice from the Montgomery County Courthouse for 21st Century Media Newspaper’s Greater Philadelphia area publications. Follow Carl on Twitter: @MontcoCourtNews
title: Judge denies Bill Cosby's request for new trial, reduced sentence

meta_data.keywords: montgomery county court, bill cosby, trials, entertainment, courts, crime, cheltenham, celebrity trial, celebrity legal affairs, celebrity, sexual abuse
meta_data.news_keywords: montgomery county court, bill cosby, trials, entertainment, courts, crime, cheltenham, celebrity trial, celebrity legal affairs, celebrity, sexual abuse
meta_data.description: NORRISTOWN — Bill Cosby has lost his initial bid for a reduced sentence or a new trial on charges he sexually assaulted a woman at his Cheltenham mansion in 2004.
meta_data.author: Carl Hessler Jr. chessler@21st-centurymedia.com @MontcoCourtNews on Twitter

og.title: Judge denies Bill Cosby's request for new trial, reduced sentence
og.description: NORRISTOWN — Bill Cosby has lost his initial bid for a reduced sentence or a new trial on charges he sexually assaulted a woman at his Cheltenham mansion in 2004.
